item.description:
The meeting location has been revised to the

Starbucks on the second level inside Target.

The time is still around 4 p.m.

I wear glasses, slight beard and

will be wearing a black jacket.

If no one shows up by around 4:30

then I will start walking around the

Mall.

http://www.westfield.com/us/retailers/us-starbucks/trumbull

www.westfield.com/us/retailers/us-starbucks/trumbull

The Malls main web link.

http://westfield.com/trumbull/

westfield.com/trumbull/

Please remember to rate the event if you attend.

If there is bad weather, then this Meet Up will be cancelled.

I know that those of you off of I – 91 North and East will think that

this is too far for you to go,

So you do not need to RSVP No and say that it is too far.

 

Mike B.

Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: Starbucks is in on the Upper Level Inside Target.
item.name: Coffee Talk Visits the Westfield Trumbull Mall
